name: Hardest Animals 6 Trivia Quiz | Mixed Animal Trivia | 10 Questions

questions.text: The domestic cat is known as felis ___?
The goldfish is related to which of these fish?
How many mouths does a sponge have?
questions.explanation:
0.

	They feed through incoming pores called ostia.

questions.text: From which animal is Morocco leather derived?
Both the male and the female reindeer have antlers.
The llama is in the same family as the camel.
questions.explanation:
True.

	They both belong to the Camelidae family.

questions.text: How many toes does a horse have, in total?
questions.explanation:
4.

	Horses have one on each foot. It corresponds to the middle digit of the human hand.

questions.text: During most of the twentieth century, skunks were classed as belonging to the same family as the weasel.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Badgers, otters, and martens are also in that family. Research in the latter part of the twentieth century has suggested that skunks should be classified differently.

questions.text: Which of these snakes is native to the United Kingdom?
questions.explanation:
Adder.

	It is also known as the viper.

questions.text: The Camargue is a breed of which animal?
questions.explanation:
Horse.

	It is a wild horse found in the Camargue region of southern France.
